00035 // Linear function representing m13 mass veto window
00036 class BdkLinFunc : public RooAbsFunc {
00037 public:
00038   BdkLinFunc(Double_t slope = 1, Double_t c = 0) :
00039     RooAbsFunc(1), _slope(slope), _c(c) {}
00040 
00041   virtual Double_t operator()(const Double_t xvector[]) const {
00042     return (_slope*xvector[0] + _c);
00043   }
00044   virtual Double_t getMinLimit(UInt_t dimension) const { return -1e6; }
00045   virtual Double_t getMaxLimit(UInt_t dimension) const { return +1e6; }
00046 
00047 private:
00048   Double_t _slope;
00049   Double_t _c;
00050 };

00060 Bdk2DpolyDalitz::Bdk2DpolyDalitz(const char *name, const char *title, 
00061                                  BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor, BdkDalitzBase::Mode DdecMode, 
00062                                  RooAbsReal& m12, RooAbsReal& m13,

00168 
00170 Double_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::evaluate() const
00171 {
00172   if (BdkDalitzBase::D0 == _flavor) {
00173     return evaluateAt(_m12, _m13);
00174   }
00175   // otherwise, return flipped coordinates:
00176   return evaluateAt(_m13, _m12);
00177 }
00178 
00180 Double_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::evaluateAt(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) const
00181 {
00182   // Check if inside Dalitz boundaries
00183   if (!inDalitz(m12,m13)) { 
00184     if (_verboseEval>1) cout << "("<<m12<<","<<m13<<") is outside the Dalitz plot."
00185                              << " Returning 0."<<endl;
00186     return 0.0;
00187   }
00188 
00189   // Evaluate
00190   Double_t value = _c0 + _c1*m12 + _c2*m13 + _c3*m12*m12 + _c4*m13*m13 + 
00191     _c5*m12*m13 + _c6*pow3(m12) + _c7*pow3(m13) + _c8*m12*m12*m13 + 
00192     _c9*m12*m13*m13 ;
00193     
00194   return value;
00195 }
00196 
00197 
00199 Int_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::getAnalyticalIntegral(RooArgSet& allVars, RooArgSet& analVars,const char* rangeName) const 
00200 {
00201   if (_forceNumInt) return 0;                      // numerical integration
00202 
00203   if (matchArgs(allVars,analVars,_m12,_m13)) {     // 2D integration
00204     return (_customInt>0 ? _customInt : 2);        // 2 = 2D hybrid, other = custom
00205   }
00206 
00207   if (matchArgs(allVars,analVars,_m12)) return 3;  // 1D analytical
00208   if (matchArgs(allVars,analVars,_m13)) return 4;  // 1D analytical
00209    
00210   return 0 ;
00211 }

00213 
00215 Double_t trapzd(const Bdk2DpolyDalitz *poly, Double_t (Bdk2DpolyDalitz::*f)(Double_t) const, Double_t a, Double_t b, Int_t n)
00216 {
00217   Double_t x    ;
00218   static Double_t s;
00219   Int_t it,j;
00220   if (n == 1) {
00221     return (s = 0.5*(b-a)*((poly->*f)(a)+(poly->*f)(b)));
00222   } 
00223   else {
00224     it = 1;
00225     for (j=1; j<n-1; j++) {
00226       it <<= 1;    // multiply by 2
00227     }
00228     Double_t del = (b-a)/it;
00229     x = a + 0.5*del;
00230     Double_t sum = 0;
00231     for (Int_t j=1; j<=it; j++) {
00232       x += del;
00233       sum += (poly->*f)(x);
00234     }
00235     s = 0.5*(s+(b-a)*sum/it );
00236     return s;
00237   }
00238 }
00239 
00241 Double_t qtrap(const Bdk2DpolyDalitz *poly, Double_t (Bdk2DpolyDalitz::*f)(Double_t) const, Double_t a, Double_t b)
00242 {
00243   Double_t s;
00244   Double_t olds = 0.0;
00245 
00246   const Int_t JMIN = 5;      // minumum number of refinements
00247   const Int_t JMAX = 100;    // maximum number of refinements
00248   const Double_t EPS = poly->epsRel();
00249 
00250   for (Int_t j=1;j<=JMAX;j++) {
00251     s = trapzd(poly,f,a,b,j);
00252     if (j > JMIN)
00253       if (abs(s-olds) < EPS*abs(olds) || (s == 0.0 && olds == 0.0)) {
00254         //        cout << j <<" integrations steps needed."<<endl;
00255         return s;
00256       }
00257     olds=s;
00258   }
00259   cout << "Too many steps in routine qtrap" << endl;
00260   return 0.0;
00261 }
00262 
00263 
00265 Double_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::intPolym12(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) const
00266 {
00267   return (_c0 + _c2*m13 + _c4*m13*m13 + _c7*m13*m13*m13)*m12 +
00268          (_c1 + _c5*m13 + _c9*m13*m13)*m12*m12/2 + 
00269          (_c3 + _c8*m13)*pow3(m12)/3 +
00270          (_c6)*pow4(m12)/4;
00271 }
00272 
00273 
00275 Double_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::intPolym13(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) const
00276 {
00277   return (_c0 + _c1*m12 + _c3*m12*m12 + _c6*m12*m12*m12)*m13 +
00278          (_c2 + _c5*m12 + _c8*m12*m12)*m13*m13/2 + 
00279          (_c4 + _c9*m12)*pow3(m13)/3 +
00280          (_c7)*pow4(m13)/4;
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00285 Double_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::intPolym13Dalitz(Double_t m12) const
00286 {
00287   // Dalitz boundaries
00288   Double_t max = m13Max(m12);
00289   Double_t min = m13Min(m12);  
00290   if (max==0 || min==0) return 0;  // not in Dalitz region
00291 
00292   Double_t result = intPolym13(m12,max) - intPolym13(m12,min);
00293 
00294   if (hasM23Veto()) {
00295     // Veto window boundaries in m13
00296     Double_t m13VetoMin = mOtherVal(m12, m23VetoMax());
00297     Double_t m13VetoMax = mOtherVal(m12, m23VetoMin());
00298 
00299     // Is veto window part of Dalitz region?
00300     if (m13VetoMin>max || m13VetoMax<min) return result;
00301 
00302      // Adjust integration range if necessary
00303     if (min<m13VetoMin) min = m13VetoMin;
00304     if (max>m13VetoMax) max = m13VetoMax;
00305 
00306     // Integrate veto window
00307     Double_t vetoInt = intPolym13(m12,max) - intPolym13(m12,min);
00308     result -= vetoInt;  
00309     if (_verboseEval>1) cout << "Veto window integration over m13 at m12 = "<<m12
00310                              <<" from "<< min <<" to " << max << " = "<<vetoInt<<"."
00311                              << " Final result = "<<result<<endl;
00312   }
00313   return result;
00314 }
00315 
00316 
00318 Double_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::intPolym12Dalitz(Double_t m13) const
00319 {
00320   // Dalitz boundaries
00321   Double_t max = m12Max(m13);
00322   Double_t min = m12Min(m13);  
00323   if (max==0 || min==0) return 0;  // not in Dalitz region
00324 
00325   Double_t result = intPolym12(max,m13) - intPolym12(min,m13);
00326 
00327   if (hasM23Veto()) {
00328     // Veto window boundaries in m13
00329     Double_t m12VetoMin = mOtherVal(m13, m23VetoMax());
00330     Double_t m12VetoMax = mOtherVal(m13, m23VetoMin());
00331 
00332     // Is veto window part of Dalitz region?
00333     if (m12VetoMin>max || m12VetoMax<min) return result;
00334 
00335      // Adjust integration range if necessary
00336     if (min<m12VetoMin) min = m12VetoMin;
00337     if (max>m12VetoMax) max = m12VetoMax;
00338 
00339     // Integrate veto window
00340     Double_t vetoInt = intPolym12(max,m13) - intPolym12(min,m13);
00341     result -= vetoInt;  
00342     if (_verboseEval>1) cout << "Veto window integration over m12 at m13 = "<<m13
00343                              <<" from "<< min <<" to " << max << " = "<<vetoInt<<"."
00344                              << " Final result = "<<result<<endl;
00345   }
00346   return result;
00347 }
00348 
00349 
00352 Double_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::intM23Veto(Double_t m12Min, Double_t m12Max) const
00353 {
00354   Double_t k = _M*_M + _m1*_m1 + _m2*_m2 + _m3*_m3;
00355 
00356   Double_t h = k - m23VetoMin();
00357   Double_t g = k - m23VetoMax();
00358 
00359   Double_t a = -1;
00360   Double_t b = -1;
00361   BdkLinFunc linFunc(-1, h);  
00362   Int_t i = findIntersection(linFunc,a,b);
00363   if (i!=2) {
00364     cout << "WARNING: Cannot integrate m23 mass veto window because only "
00365          << i << "intersection(s) with Dalitz boundary were found."<<endl;
00366     return -1;
00367   }
00368   if (m12Min>a) a = m12Min;
00369   if (m12Max<b) b = m12Max;
00370 
00371   Double_t result = 1/4*(_c7+_c8-_c9-_c6)*(g-h)*(pow4(b)-pow4(a))
00372     + 1/3*((3/2*_c7+_c8/2-_c9)*(h*h-g*g)+(_c3+_c4-_c5)*(h-g))*(pow3(b)-pow3(a))
00373     + 1/2*((_c7-_c9/3)*(pow3(g)-pow3(h))+(_c4-_c5/2)*(g*g-h*h)+(_c2-_c1)*(g-h))*(b*b-a*a)
00374     + (_c7/4*(pow4(h)-pow4(g))+_c4/3*(pow3(h)-pow3(g))+_c2/2*(h*h-g*g)+_c0*(h-g))*(b-a);
00375 
00376   return result;
00377 }
00378 
00379 
00380 Double_t Bdk2DpolyDalitz::analyticalIntegral(Int_t code,const char* rangeName) const 
00381 {
00382   Double_t result = 0;
00383   
00384   Double_t max1 = _m12.max(rangeName);
00385   Double_t min1 = _m12.min(rangeName);
00386 
00387   if (code==1) {       // 2D analytical integration (with some approximations)
00388     
00389     // Here used to be Kalanand's aproximated analytical integral
00390     // I removed it since it wasn't sufficient. 
00391     // Go back to CVS revision 1.14 to retrieve it.
00392 
00393     cout << "Analytical integral not supported."<<endl;
00394 
00395     if (_verboseEval) cout << "Doing analytical integration from "
00396                            <<min1<<" to "<<max1 << " = "<< result<<endl;
00397   }
00398 
00399   else if (code==2) {   // 2D hybrid integration (m13 analytical, m12 numerical)
00400 
00401     result = qtrap(this, &Bdk2DpolyDalitz::intPolym13Dalitz,min1,max1);
00402 
00403     if (_verboseEval) cout << "Doing custom numerical integration from "
00404                            <<min1<<" to "<<max1 <<" = "<<result<<endl;
00405   }
00406   else if (code==3) {  // 1D analytical integration over m12
00407 
00408     result = intPolym12Dalitz(_m13);
00409 
00410     if (_verboseEval) cout << "Doing 1D analytical integration over m12 from "
00411                            << min1 <<" to " << max1 << " = " <<result<<endl;
00412  
00413   }
00414   else if (code==4) {  // 1D analytical integration over m13
00415 
00416     result = intPolym13Dalitz(_m12);
00417   
00418     if (_verboseEval) cout << "Doing 1D analytical integration over m13 from "
00419                            << min1 <<" to " << max1 << " = " <<result<<endl;
00420 
00421   }
00422   else assert(0);
00423 
00424   return result;
00425 }
